title: What I think would be a perfect VU for Evelynn
body:
I've recently come across some beautiful Evelynn fan models that someone made on Polycount.com and I think this would be a perfect design that RIOT should base their VU off of.

Her outfit design looks perfect for her character and actually looks like something she'd wear. This SHOULD be the VU IMO. What do you guys think?

The source page and creator's post.
http://www.polycount.com/forum/showthread.php?t=128805

replies.body:
I appreciate the time the person put into creating this, but I really dislike the bathing suit she is wearing, her design smells of shark which I dont like, her boots remind me of Cait, her cape is too short, and she seems to have lost the potential for the sleek and sexy tango dancer, and masquerader that I love. Additionally no particular part of her goes "BAM! Take THAT! Yeah! I'm Evelyn!" It all just goes "woo, high poly count ftw."

It is certainly a creative Evelyn, but I feel like it lost a bit too much of who she is to get there.

You forgot a third option "Not bad - Not best"

I would take this option (didn't either participate on the poll).

However, while yes it looks good, there are some points I have some doubt in.

First. The waist is pretty much too wide, it's not like the original Eve looks like.

Second. The hair looks a bit too plastic and the cape is a bit too short.

And Third. Too much details. Never forget that League of Legends is a MOBA and you play Eve from a far distant view, which make too many details unnecessary.

> First. The waist is pretty much too wide, it's not like the original Eve looks like.

I'll disagree here. Maybe it's not like Eve *does* look, I think it's how she *should* look, ie, more realistic.
 
> Second. The hair looks a bit too plastic and the cape is a bit too short.

I'm with you here.

> And Third. Too much details. Never forget that League of Legends is a MOBA and you play Eve from a far distant view, which make too many details unnecessary.

Also agreed - from far away, more details just makes the form less clear.
I voted no but in truth I like the look. I just feel its not as hot as I would like.

I found something accidentally in the internet.  

I had another problem with the model of Eve - you can't see her ears, because they are normally "elve ears". Elve ears are important.

http://www.newsoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/01/everedesignfinished.jpg  
That's pretty good and I think this is very close to something I would rather want to see.
Not digging the golem skin.  The outfit, face, and tattoos are solid though.
Doesn't quite hit the mark for me, but is a step in the right direction imo

I think this would be a great visual update for Eve, and I think it actually makes her look more like she could have come from the shadow isles. Also, (and this is my personal opinion) I like the fact that these visuals dress her up in at least a bit more clothing. 

But the look is great. Please Rito! :)
